channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚 Syrah Resources 与韩国 Posco Future M 签署承购协议
item.description: Australia's Syrah Resources said on Friday it will supply natural graphite product from its Balama Graphite Operations in Mozambique to South Korean chemical and battery material maker Posco Future M .翻译:澳大利亚Syrah Resources周五表示，将向韩国化学和电池材料制造商Posco Future M供应莫桑比克Balama石墨业务的天然石墨产品。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：市场活跃，但中国 PMI 等待公布
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中国房价今年可能下跌0.9%；之前的民意调查显示增长：路透社​​民意调查
item.description: New home prices in China are likely to fall this year due to limited effect of ongoing government support measures, a Reuters poll showed, with economists predicting the ailing market will need more than a year to bottom out.翻译:路透调查显示，由于政府持续支持措施的效果有限，今年中国的新房价格可能会下跌，经济学家预测，疲软的市场需要一年多的时间才能触底。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo

item.title: 向俄罗斯走私军事技术的俄罗斯男子在美国法庭认罪
item.description: A Russian man pled guilty on Thursday to U.S. charges that he smuggled large quantities of American-made, military-grade microelectronics to Russia, top U.S. justice officials said in a statement.翻译:美国高级司法官员在一份声明中表示，一名俄罗斯男子周四承认美国指控他向俄罗斯走私大量美国制造的军用级微电子产品。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音公司将就美国出口违规行为支付 5100 万美元和解金
item.description: Boeing Co has agreed to pay $51 million in a settlement with the U.S. State Department for unauthorized exports of technical data, including to China, the department said on Thursday.翻译:美国国务院周四表示，波音公司已同意就未经授权出口技术数据（包括向中国出口）问题与美国国务院达成和解，支付 5100 万美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国贸易主管：世贸组织谈判需要“复杂的权衡”
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai said on Friday breakthroughs were still possible in overnight negotiations at the World Trade Organization, but "complex trade-offs" would be needed even for less difficult topics such as fishing.翻译:美国贸易代表戴凯瑟琳周五表示，世界贸易组织隔夜谈判仍有可能取得突破，但即使对于渔业等不太困难的话题也需要“复杂的权衡”。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 2023年中国电动汽车对外投资可能创下新纪录
item.description: Chinese outbound foreign direct investment along the electric vehicle value chain likely set a new record in 2023, a report from Rhodium Group showed, as western economies step up scrutiny of China's production-focussed, debt driven development model.翻译:荣鼎集团的一份报告显示，随着西方经济体加强对中国以生产为中心、债务驱动的发展模式的审查，中国电动汽车价值链上的对外直接投资可能会在 2023 年创下新纪录。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 斐济称世贸组织的渔业协议不足以保护太平洋岛屿
item.description: A grouping of Pacific islands, including Fiji, Papua New Guinea and the Solomon Islands, are opposing a draft deal on changes to fisheries subsidies at the World Trade Organization talks in Abu Dhabi, arguing that it does not go far enough.翻译:包括斐济、巴布亚新几内亚和所罗门群岛在内的一些太平洋岛屿反对在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织谈判中提出的一项关于改变渔业补贴的协议草案，认为该协议做得还不够。
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: 中国零售商进一步打折 iPhone 15
item.description: Major Chinese third-party retailers JD.com , TMall, and Pinduoduo are battling for customers by offering more steep discounts on Apple's iPhone 15 just five months after launch, as the U.S. tech company suffers slowing sales in China.翻译:由于苹果公司的 iPhone 15 在中国的销售放缓，中国主要第三方零售商京东、天猫和拼多多在 iPhone 15 发布仅五个月后就提供了更大的折扣，以争夺客户。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 德国希望大型科技公司支付新数字法的合规成本
item.description: Germany wants Big Tech companies Alphabet , Amazon , Apple , ByteDance, Meta Platforms and Microsoft to contribute towards the compliance costs of new European Union rules aimed at curbing their power, a senior German economy ministry official said on Thursday.翻译:德国经济部一位高级官员周四表示，德国希望大型科技公司 Alphabet、亚马逊、苹果、字节跳动、Meta Platform 和微软为旨在限制其权力的欧盟新规则的合规成本做出贡献。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 早盘买盘：随着个人消费支出通胀迫在眉睫，日元在闰日上涨
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国将调查中国汽车是否构成国家数据安全风险
item.description: The United States is opening an investigation into whether Chinese vehicle imports pose national security risks and could impose restrictions due to concerns about "connected" car technology, the White House said on Thursday.翻译:白宫周四表示，美国正在对中国汽车进口是否构成国家安全风险展开调查，并可能因对“联网”汽车技术的担忧而实施限制。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 芬兰商人齐利亚库斯退出国际米兰竞赛
item.description: Finnish businessman Thomas Zilliacus said on Thursday he had dropped out of the running to buy Inter Milan to focus on clearing his name after police in Singapore issued a warrant for his arrest last week.翻译:芬兰商人托马斯·齐利亚库斯(Thomas Zilliacus)周四表示，在新加坡警方上周对他发出逮捕令后，他已退出收购国际米兰的竞选，以集中精力洗清自己的罪名。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本投资者对海外股票的配置多于对本国股票的配置
item.description: Japanese investors are hesitant to own their home stock markets despite the Nikkei's recent surge above bubble-era peaks because of uncertainty about sustained corporate returns and lingering memories of the 1990s market crash.翻译:尽管日经指数最近飙升至泡沫时代的峰值之上，但由于企业持续回报的不确定性以及对 90 年代市场崩盘的挥之不去的记忆，日本投资者对持有本国股票市场仍犹豫不决。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国谴责外国对香港即将实施的《国家安全法》第23条的批评
item.description: China on Thursday criticised British Foreign Secretary David Cameron and other foreign politicians for "smearing" an upcoming Hong Kong security law, as local authorities said feedback on the law had been largely positive.翻译:中国周四批评英国外交大臣戴维·卡梅伦和其他外国政客“抹黑”即将出台的香港安全法，因为地方当局表示对该法的反馈基本上是积极的。
item.author: Jessie Pang, James Pomfret

item.title: 中国企业加大招聘力度，但在薪酬方面却收紧
item.description: Chinese university graduate Zhang Baichuan travels hundreds of kilometres from one job fair to another in a final push to find a better offer than the unappealing one he received after more than 1,000 applications.翻译:中国大学毕业生张百川长途跋涉数百公里，从一个招聘会到另一个招聘会，最后努力寻找比他在 1000 多份申请后收到的毫无吸引力的工作机会更好的工作机会。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Xiaoyu Yin, Marius Zaharia

item.title: 舒适达制造商 Haleon 因股票回购和债务下降而跃升
item.description: Haleon plans to buy back 500 million pounds ($633 million) of its shares this year amid firm demand for its products and progress in reducing debt, sending the British consumer healthcare giant's shares up as much as 9% on Thursday.翻译:由于对其产品的强劲需求以及在减少债务方面取得的进展，Haleon 计划今年回购 5 亿英镑（6.33 亿美元）的股票，这使得这家英国消费者医疗保健巨头的股价周四上涨了 9%。
item.author: Eva Mathews

item.title: 独家：SpaceX 与越南就星链计划的谈判暂停
item.description: SpaceX's plans to provide communications services to Vietnam with its Starlink satellites have been put on hold, three sources familiar with the matter said, halting support for Vietnamese coast guard drones.翻译:三名知情人士称，SpaceX 通过星链卫星向越南提供通信服务的计划已被搁置，并停止了对越南海岸警卫队无人机的支持。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 澳大利亚部长称中国在太平洋警务中“没有任何作用”
item.description: Australia's Pacific Minister Pat Conroy said there should be "no role" for China in policing the Pacific Islands, and Australia will train more local security forces to fill gaps, after Reuters reported Chinese police are working in Kiribati.翻译:在路透社报道中国警察在基里巴斯工作后，澳大利亚太平洋部长帕特·康罗伊表示，中国在太平洋岛屿的治安方面“不应该发挥任何作用”，澳大利亚将培训更多当地安全部队来填补空白。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国2月份工厂活动可能连续第五个月收缩
item.description: China's manufacturing activity likely contracted for a fifth straight month in February, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, possibly increasing the clamour for further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders both at home and abroad.翻译:路透周四的一项民意调查显示，中国2月份制造业活动可能连续第五个月萎缩，由于工厂主在国内外争取订单而苦苦挣扎，这可能会加剧要求采取进一步刺激措施的呼声。
item.author: Joe Cash
